mapper.select: insert into t_employee (name,gender,nation, birthday,zodiac,card_id, telephone,qq,email, education,school,major, level,post_level,salary, entry_date,probation,regular_date, contract_year,contract_end_date, department,job,on_job) values (#{name},#{gender},#{nation}, #{birthday},#{zodiac},#{card_id}, #{telephone},#{qq},#{email}, #{education},#{school},#{major}, #{level},#{post_level},#{salary}, #{entry_date},#{probation},#{regular_date}, #{contract_year},#{contract_end_date}, #{department},#{job},#{on_job})
